MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the SY20 postcode area of Machynlleth, affecting properties in Abercegir and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  12:37PM. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3.45PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1.16PM on 23rd November 2020
